sn22.90:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ sambahulā therā bhikkhū bārāṇasiyaṃ viharanti isipatane migadāye.
sn22.90:1.2: Atha kho āyasmā channo sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito avāpuraṇaṃ ādāya vihārena vihāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā there bhikkhū etadavoca:
sn22.90:1.3: “ovadantu maṃ āyasmanto therā, anusāsantu maṃ āyasmanto therā, karontu me āyasmanto therā dhammiṃ kathaṃ, yathāhaṃ dhammaṃ passeyyan”ti.
sn22.90:2.1: Evaṃ vutte, therā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ channaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn22.90:3.11: Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, sabbe dhammā anattā’ti.
sn22.90:3.12: Atha ca pana me sabbasaṅkhārasamathe sabbūpadhipaṭinissagge taṇhākkhaye virāge nirodhe nibbāne cittaṃ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati nādhimuccati.
sn22.90:3.16: Na kho panevaṃ dhammaṃ passato hoti.
sn22.90:3.17: Ko nu kho me tathā dhammaṃ deseyya yathāhaṃ dhammaṃ passeyyan”ti.
sn22.90:4.2: “ayaṃ kho āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ, pahoti ca me āyasmā ānando tathā dhammaṃ desetuṃ yathāhaṃ dhammaṃ passeyyaṃ;
sn22.90:4.3: atthi ca me āyasmante ānande tāvatikā vissaṭṭhi.
sn22.90:4.5: Atha kho āyasmā channo senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena kosambī ghositārāmo yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā ānandena saddhiṃ sammodi …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā channo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.90:5.1: “Ekamidāhaṃ, āvuso ānanda, samayaṃ bārāṇasiyaṃ viharāmi isipatane migadāye.
sn22.90:5.2: Atha khvāhaṃ, āvuso, sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito avāpuraṇaṃ ādāya vihārena vihāraṃ upasaṅkamiṃ;
sn22.90:5.4: ‘ovadantu maṃ āyasmanto therā, anusāsantu maṃ āyasmanto therā, karontu me āyasmanto therā dhammiṃ kathaṃ yathāhaṃ dhammaṃ passeyyan’ti.
sn22.90:5.5: Evaṃ vutte, maṃ, āvuso, therā bhikkhū etadavocuṃ:
sn22.90:5.13: Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, sabbe dhammā anattā’ti.
sn22.90:6.8: Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, sabbe dhammā anattā’ti.
sn22.90:6.9: Atha ca pana me sabbasaṅkhārasamathe sabbūpadhipaṭinissagge taṇhākkhaye virāge nirodhe nibbāne cittaṃ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati nādhimuccati.
sn22.90:6.13: Na kho panevaṃ dhammaṃ passato hoti.
sn22.90:6.14: Ko nu kho me tathā dhammaṃ deseyya yathāhaṃ dhammaṃ passeyyanti.
sn22.90:7.2: ‘ayaṃ kho āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ, pahoti ca me āyasmā ānando tathā dhammaṃ desetuṃ yathāhaṃ dhammaṃ passeyyaṃ.
sn22.90:7.3: Atthi ca me āyasmante ānande tāvatikā vissaṭṭhi.
sn22.90:7.7: karotu me, āyasmā ānando dhammiṃ kathaṃ yathāhaṃ dhammaṃ passeyyan”ti.
sn22.90:8.1: “Ettakenapi mayaṃ āyasmato channassa attamanā api nāma taṃ āyasmā channo āvi akāsi khīlaṃ chindi.
sn22.90:8.4: Atha kho āyasmato channassa tāvatakeneva uḷāraṃ pītipāmojjaṃ uppajji:
sn22.90:9.1: “Sammukhā metaṃ, āvuso channa, bhagavato sutaṃ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ kaccānagottaṃ bhikkhuṃ ovadantassa—
sn22.90:9.2: dvayanissito khvāyaṃ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena atthitañceva natthitañca.
sn22.90:9.3: Lokasamudayaṃ kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato yā loke natthitā, sā na hoti.
sn22.90:9.4: Lokanirodhaṃ kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato yā loke atthitā, sā na hoti.
sn22.90:9.6: taṃ cāyaṃ upayupādānaṃ cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayaṃ na upeti na upādiyati nādhiṭṭhāti ‘attā me’ti.
sn22.90:9.7: Dukkhameva uppajjamānaṃ uppajjati, dukkhaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ nirujjhatīti na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati.
sn22.90:9.12: Ete te, kaccāna, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathāgato dhammaṃ deseti—
sn22.90:10.1: “Evametaṃ, āvuso ānanda, hoti yesaṃ āyasmantānaṃ tādisā sabrahmacārayo anukampakā atthakāmā ovādakā anusāsakā.
sn22.90:10.2: Idañca pana me āyasmato ānandassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā dhammo abhisamito”ti.
